title: Sources: George, doctors mulling star's injuries
description: 76ers forward Paul George is consulting with doctors this week on treatment options for his groin and knee injuries, including a possible procedure, sources told ESPN.
author: Shams Charania

title: Flagg 'long shot' for ACC semis after ankle injury
description: Duke freshman phenom Cooper Flagg is a "real long shot" to play in the ACC tournament semifinals after suffering a sprained left ankle, coach Jon Scheyer said.

title: 'Perfect captain' Fernandes 'sometimes needs to trust team-mates'
description: Bruno Fernandes is the "perfect captain" for Manchester United but "needs to trust his team-mates", says boss Ruben Amorim.

title: Price beats Littler to win Premier League night six
description: Gerwyn Price beats Luke Littler 6-3 in the night six final in Nottingham to win his second event in the 2025 Premier League Darts.

title: Three share Sawgrass lead with McIlroy, Scheffler chasing
description: Rory McIlroy overcame an erratic display off the tee to get within a shot of the lead at The Players, as Scottie Scheffler made a strong start to his title defence.

title: Price stuns Littler to win Night Six in Nottingham
description: Gerwyn Price stunned Luke Littler 6-3 in the final to win Night Six of the Premier League in Nottingham.

title: Highlights from Colts new CB Charvarius Ward's free agency press conference
description: New Colts' CB Charvarius Ward met with the media on Thursday. Here are the highlights from the interview.

title: Taylor Heinicke re-signs with Chargers
description: The career of quarterback Taylor Heinicke will continue.
